root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 3-d-1, translated into en
root.data:
1) it is based on a self-assessment and reporting by the State Party

2) The questionnaire used from 2010 to 2017 was replaced by the IHR State Parties Self-Assessment Tool – SPAR, published in July 2018 and still used in 2020. The titles, contents and indicators for each capacities had changed and not comparable in a same historical Serie.
